item.description:
** Event starts promptly at 7pm!! Greeting wine is available between 6:45 and 7pm **

 

Cost : $18 to $19 / person. Please bring some extra $1.

 

** Could you bring an appetizer? Please send me an email **

 

The National Tasting Project tasting Pinot Noirs from around the world.

I'm currently limiting the attendance to 18 total between the two groups.

 

Thanks to the volunteers: Charlie, Dick, Eleanor, Richard and Noel. They will present the wines, run the event and tally the scores.

 

We will have many glasses from this event. 18*6=108 glasses. If everyone pitches in after the tasting with several teams of 3(washer, dryer, packer), we can send the glasses home with their owners.
item.name: National Tasting Project
